# $effectiveMaximumMovieRating

**Instance Property**

The movie rating constraint that is active on this device.

## Declaration

```swift
var $effectiveMaximumMovieRating: Published<Int>.Publisher { get }
```

## Discussion

An authorized app can use the Family Controls framework to apply a [doc://com.apple.ManagedSettings/documentation/ManagedSettings/MediaSettings/maximumMovieRating-swift.property] to the device. If no `maximumMovieRating` settings are active, then the value of this property is the default value of  [doc://com.apple.ManagedSettings/documentation/ManagedSettings/MediaSettings/maximumMovieRating-swift.type.property]. The system publishes changes dynamically.

## Observing Current Settings

- **$effectiveMaximumTVShowRating**: The television show rating constraint that is active on this device.
